FYI

The scenes that appear in that video are (in
sequence):

Shimizu-ya
Amida-ji (+ Gosankai)
Tsurugajo Castle
view from Tsurugajo
Aizu-han-ko gyoretsu (Aizu parade)
Kondo Isami's grave at Tenneiji
Matsudaira clan grave
Byakkotai memorial service + kenbu
Old Takizawa headquarters
Nanoka-machi doori (avenue where Amida-ji is)
Aizu Shinsengumi matsuri (Aizu Wakamatsu)
Dog :D
Saito Hajime memorial service (+ Mugai-ryu enbu)
Shinsengumi summit

I have a picture of that Shimizu-ya stone and
explanation. I created a folder named Aizu Wakamatsu
in the Photos section and put some pics there for
those who are interested.

Serizawa Kamo
